ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Brawlers
ygData.msgSnippet: -- From: Squires, Dean  ... Well i VERY rarely use Smite against any critters but i find Holy Might quite a good offensive
ygData.messageBody:
-- From: "Squires, Dean" <DeanSquires@...>
>Just wanted to open a discussion on Clerics who love to fight. I am
>happy being a cleric, but I cannot resist jumping into the heat of a
>battle and kicking some back. I also like to occassionally tank. I try
>to save all my mana for healing, but sometimes I just love to blast
>away. This is probably because I feel useless when grouped as my
>regular attack doesn't compare to others in the group. Anyone else feel
>this way? Any experiences to share?

Well i VERY rarely use Smite against any critters but i find Holy Might
quite a good offensive spell since it prevents the mob from hitting the
tanks and thus saving HP. It's only the undead that i really use my
offensive spells against, especially if there are more than one cleric
in group. If i find that there is no real danger of anyone getting killed
and that i will not need to med to heal them i go in and melee. Doesn't
it really make you feel good when you finally see the horrible werebat
in front of your group slayed down and that you had some real good blows
at it? At least i do : )

Iyenya Goldenheart
Lvl 23 dwarf cleric
Innoruuk server
